com.csme.csmeapi.fin.services

Class InquiryListApiService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csme.csmeapi.fin.services.InquiryListApiService

  • public class InquiryListApiService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides services for handling inquiries and responses related to financial transactions. This class interacts with databases and XML files to retrieve and process transaction information.

      • getInquiryInfo

        public XInquiryListResponse getInquiryInfo(@Valid
                                           @Valid XInquiryListRequest body,
                                           java.util.UUID requestId,
                                           java.lang.Long sequence)
        Retrieves inquiry information based on the provided request parameters.
        Parameters:
        body - The request body containing inquiry parameters.
        requestId - The unique identifier for the request.
        sequence - The sequence number for tracking the request order.
        Returns:
        An XInquiryListResponse object containing the inquiry response.

      • getIboxQuery

        public java.lang.StringBuilder getIboxQuery(XInquiryListRequest body,
                                            org.w3c.dom.Document inquiryXml)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs the SQL query for ibox based on the inquiry request and XML configuration.
        Parameters:
        body - The inquiry request containing filter and module information.
        inquiryXml - The XML document containing inquiry configuration.
        Returns:
        A StringBuilder containing the constructed SQL query for ibox.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there's an error during query construction.
